Title: Caldera of the Menders
Description:
Your vision from the arcane beacon showed that there are dracthyr trapped within their creches. We cannot afford to lose any more of our people.

<Emberthal pauses, her brow furrowed.>

The Healing Wings are the finest medics in our ranks. Their creche lies within the Caldera of the Menders. Cindrethresh knows the way.

Leave no one behind, evoker.
ObjectivesText: Meet Cindrethresh in the Caldera of the Menders.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Speak with Cindrethresh at the Caldera of the Menders.
RewardText:
Look at all these wounded...

There are more Menders inside. We need to help them!

Objectives.Text: Meet Cindrethresh at the Caldera of the Menders
